name: Bots n' Bugs
description:
Bots n' Bugs

Oh no ! Botland has been attacked by creepy creatures like  slimes , rats and SPIDERS !
It's your job to kill all of these and restore peace to Botland.

INSTRUCTIONS
- WASD or arrow keys to move around
- Stomp on enemies to kill them
- Touch the door to enter the next level

CREDITS
- Music : Kevin Macleoed
- Art assets : Kenney
- Development: Flashsloth

Made using the Godot Game Engine.
